Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Job Description
              

              Do you want an opportunity to work for the world’s largest Shopper Marketing & Activation agency? While working with leading professionals on exciting campaigns?
              

              Successful candidates will learn the Geometry Global planning systems, idea generation platforms, consumer journey development, integration of technology into campaigns, application of digital marketing to conversion campaigns, and more.
              

              If you’re extraordinarily energetic, curious, and passionate, with an intense ambition to develop your marketing career with the world’s best, please get in touch.
              

              This is what we’re looking for:
              
              You have :
              
              •	The Passion for working on exciting, successful marketing campaigns
              
              •	The ambition to create things that have never been done before.
              
              •	The enthusiasm and the can-do attitude to contribute to a positive and creative environment!
              
              •	And preferably some experience working in shopper marketing and brand activation campaigns
              

              You can :
              
              •	Manage timelines and action plans
              
              •	Work on a team and independently
              
              •	Work with client directly as needed
              
              •	You can generate and execute groundbreaking ideas
              
              •	You can perform under pressure while having fun
